security_audit.summary: This skill executes external commands and tools to perform code quality checks. While it has legitimate purpose for development workflows, it executes shell commands which could be misused. The risk is low as it's designed for legitimate quality assurance purposes.

low_findings.title: External command execution
low_findings.description: The skill executes external commands including 'npx claude-flow', 'parallel', 'cat', and 'jq'. While these are legitimate development tools, execution of external commands always carries some risk if input validation is insufficient.

content.user_title: Run instant code quality checks in parallel
content.value_statement: Code quality checks take too long and slow down development. Run theater detection, linting, security scans, and tests in parallel for instant feedback.
actual_capabilities: Runs style audits for formatting issues
limitations: Requires external tools to be installed

best_practices: Run before committing code to catch issues early
Set up as pre-commit hook for consistent quality
Focus on fixing critical and high severity issues first
anti_patterns: Don't ignore medium/low severity issues long-term
Don't run on entire codebase without filtering
Don't rely solely on quick mode for production releases

faq.question: What is theater detection?
faq.answer: Theater detection identifies placeholder code, mock data, TODO comments, and incomplete implementations that need real code

faq.question: Can I run this on large codebases?
faq.answer: Yes, but use file filters or specific directories. Quick mode is optimized for speed over thoroughness

faq.question: How does parallel execution work?
faq.answer: The skill spawns multiple agents that run different checks simultaneously, then merges results for faster feedback

faq.question: Is my code data safe?
faq.answer: The skill only analyzes your code locally. No code is sent to external services during quality checks

faq.question: What if checks fail?
faq.answer: The skill continues running other checks and reports all findings. Critical issues are escalated for detailed review

faq.question: How is this different from standard linters?
faq.answer: Quick-quality-check combines multiple tools in parallel and provides a unified quality score with prioritized issues
